title: Obama Says Paris Climate Talks Bound to ‘Fall Short’
text:
28 Obama Says Paris Climate Talks Bound to ‘Fall Short’ 
Climate Central: President Barack Obama said he hopes major countries agree to "aggressive enough targets" to cut carbon emissions at climate talks in Paris later this year, but he said any deal will fall short of what is needed to slow global warming.
